The supplier hereby guarantee that, as of the date of shipment or delivery, the articles comprising each shipment of delivery hereafter are on such date not adulterated or misbranded within the meaning of Federal Food, Drug & Cosmetics Act as amended; the Food Additives Amendment  (together, the "FD&C Act")or (2) not an article which may not under the provisions of Sections 404 or 505 said Act, as amended, be introduced into interstate commerce and not adulterated  or  misbranded  within  the  meaning of the  food laws  or ordinance (then in effect) of the state or city to which such  articles are shipped, the provisions of which are identical or substantially the same as those found in the Federal Food and Drug & Cosmetic Act. That the food products, ingredients and components are of merchantable quality, fit for the ordinary purposes for which such food products are normally used and wholesome and fit for human consumption. Non-Irradiated/No-Sludge Guarantee 7 CFR 205.105  are not grown or handled with the use of sewer sludge and ionizing radiation, as described in Food and Drug Administration regulation, 21 CFR 179.26 . Lot Code have been assigned a unique lot code to ensure complete traceability down to each raw material and packaging material used. BSE / TSE are NOT of animal origin. Furthermore, as a FDA (Food and Drug Administration) regulated facility, and in accordance with the FDA proposed rules and approved guidelines, we have taken appropriate steps to minimize the risk of contamination of our products with Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy (BSE) or Transmissible Spongiform Encephalopathy (TSE).  Animal By-Products, Human-Derived Products, BPA, Melamine are free of animal by-products, human-derived products, BPA, or Melamine. Our products have not been tested on animals. 1.13 Food Contact Packaging Safely NOP 7 CFR 205.272(b)(1)  have not been allowed to come in contact with synthetic fungicide, preservative, or fumigant. All food contact packaging materials are free of prohibited synthetic fungicide, preservative, or fumigant. 1.14 Heavy Metals, California Toxics in Packaging Prevention Act (AB2021), and Ethical Standards / California Transparency in Supply Chains Act of 2010 and applicable US Federal regulations were produced without the use of forced labor such as child labor, slavery, prison labor. We strive to comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding employment, occupational health and safety, and immigration. Our suppliers are also required to meet our ethical standards.

Manufacturing process description:
data.value: The peel oil, or essential oil, is located at the pericarp of the fruit, in small bags. The extraction of this oil is made by a cold process, so the product is also called Cold Pressed Oil. The extraction is made using the same machinery for juice extraction JBT extractors. The oil is taken using a water spray that produces an emulsion of 1 to 3% oil. This emulsion water/oil is pumped to a first centrifuge that concentrates the oil mixture to 70 to 80% of oil. This one goes to a second centrifuge that will polish the product resulting 100% oil. This product is kept at low temperature for a time necessary to separate the wax that may be present.
